enabled.description: Switch to enable or disable health endpoints

path.description: The path by which to expose health endpoint

enabled.description: Switch to enable or disable stats endpoints

path.description: The path by which to expose collector statistics

enabled.description: Whether or not to time out all requests after a specified period of time

ms.description: Time out request and return a 4xx status code if this number of milliseconds is exceeded

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the rate limiter

period.description: The period by which to limit requests

limit.description: The number of requests allowed within the specified period

enabled.description: Whether or not to activate the server-side id cookie

name.description: The name of the id cookie

ttlDays.description: The number of days to persist the id cookie

sameSite.description: The sameSite attribute of the id cookie

enabled.description: Whether or not to activate the CORS middleware

allowOrigin.description: A list of origins to allow CORS

enabled.description: Whether or not to activate the json request logging middleware
Whether or not to activate the yeet middleware
Whether or not to activate snowplow tracking

standardRoutesEnabled.description: Whether to not to activate the standard snowplow routes

openRedirectsEnabled.description: Whether or not to activate redirect-based tracking

getPath.description: The path by which to process get-based events

postPath.description: The path by which to process post-based events

redirectPath.description: The path by which to process redirect-based events

ip.description: Whether or not to hash the ip address of incoming snowplow events

userId.description: Whether or not to hash the userId of incoming snowplow events

enabled.description: Whether or not to activate cloudevents tracking

path.description: The path by which to process incoming cloudevents payloads

enabled.description: Whether or not to activate generic self-describing event tracking

path.description: The path by which to process incoming self describing payloads

rootKey.description: The root json key that defines event contexts

payload.description: Self describing events payload data config

rootKey.description: The root json key that defines payload data. (root.PAYLOADKEY)

schemaKey.description: The key that defines the payload schema. (root.PAYLOADKEY.SCHEMAKEY)

dataKey.description: The key that defines the payload data. (root.PAYLOADKEY.DATAKEY)

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable arbitrary webhooks
Whether or not to enable 1x1 pixels
Whether or not to enable the relay

type.description: The type of schema cache backend

path.description: The root path of the schema cache backend

bucket.description: The schema cache bucket, if applicable

host.description: The schema cache host, if applicable

registryTable.description: The database table that stores schemas

pgDbName.description: The postgres cache backend db name

mysqlDbName.description: The mysql cache backend db name

mzDbName.description: The materialize cache backend db name

ttlSeconds.description: The number of seconds to cache schemas for

maxSizeBytes.description: The max schema cache size, in bytes

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable schema cache purge endpoints

path.description: The path by which to purge the schema cache

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable schema cache endpoints

kafkaBrokers.description: A list of kafka brokers (HOST:PORT), if sink type is kafka

elasticsearchHosts.description: A list of elasticsearch hosts, if sink type is elasticsearch

elasticsearchUsername.description: The elasticsearch username, if sink type is elasticsearch

elasticsearchPassword.description: The elasticsearch password, if sink type is elasticsearch

validTopic.description: The name of the valid event topic

validStream.description: The name of the valid event stream, if sink type is kinesis

validUrl.description: The url to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is http or https

validIndex.description: The index to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is elasticsearch

validFile.description: The file to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is file

validTable.description: The table to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is postgres

validChannel.description: The channel to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is pubnub

validCollection.description: The collection to sink valid envelopes to if sink type is mongodb

invalidTopic.description: The name of the invalid event topic

invalidStream.description: The name of the invalid event stream, if sink type is kinesis

invalidUrl.description: The url to sink invalid envelopes if sink type is http or https

invalidIndex.description: The index to sink invalid envelopes to if sink type is elasticsearch

invalidFile.description: The file to sink invalid envelopes to if sink type is file

invalidTable.description: The table to sink invalid envelopes to if sink type is postgres

invalidChannel.description: The channel to sink invalid envelopes to if sink type is pubnub

invalidCollection.description: The collection to sink invalid envelopes to if sink type is mongodb

project.description: The name of the GCP project, if sink type is pubsub

relayUrl.description: The url to relay envelopes to, if sink type is relay

pgHost.description: The database hostname to write envelopes to if sink type is postgres

pgPort.description: The database port to write envelopes to if sink type is postgres

pgDbName.description: The database name if sink type is postgres

pgUser.description: The database connection user if sink type is postgres

pgPass.description: The database connection password if sink type is postgres

mysqlHost.description: The database hostname to write envelopes to if sink type is mysql

mysqlPort.description: The database port to write envelopes to if sink type is mysql

mysqlDbName.description: The database name if sink type is mysql

mysqlUser.description: The database connection user if sink type is mysql

mysqlPass.description: The database connection password if sink type is mysql

mzHost.description: The database hostname to write envelopes to if sink type is materialize

mzPort.description: The database port to write envelopes to if sink type is materialize

mzDbName.description: The database name if sink type is materialize

mzUser.description: The database connection user if sink type is materialize

mzPass.description: The database connection password if sink type is materialize

clickhouseHost.description: The database hostname to write envelopes to if sink type is clickhouse

clickhousePort.description: The database port to write envelopes to if sink type is clickhouse

clickhouseDbName.description: The database name if sink type is clickhouse

clickhouseUser.description: The database connection user if sink type is clickhouse

clickhousePass.description: The database connection password if sink type is clickhouse

mongoPort.description: The mongo port if sink type is mongodb

mongoDbName.description: The mongo database name if sink type is mongodb

mongoUser.description: The mongo database user if sink type is mongodb

mongoPass.description: The mongo database password if sink type is mongodb

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the squawkbox

genericPath.description: Path for the generic self-describing events squawkbox

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable telemetry
